name: Danger! Plants 'n' Seeds
description:
Ludum Dare link: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/danger-plants-n-seeds

Welcome to Danger! Plants ‘n’ Seeds - a plant simulator where YOU live the gruesome life of a plant and its struggles in nature, surviving against all odds.

Evolve your seed, develop skills to resist against many dangers and attract allies to help in your quest to spread and conquer the world and its many biomes and ecossystems.

How to play

You will begin with base stats (Water, Energy and HP) that increment per second.

Once in a while, you will be prompted to evolve your plant and enhance a stat of your choice.

Some dangers and effects will appear and try to waste you, choose wisely your stats to endure the danger and events of the nature.

After 5 upgrades you will generated a seed that will be planted in another environment persisting the stats that you evolved in your past plants.

Try to survive and be the strongest plant!
